name: Paperwork
description:
It's time to do some paperwork!

Play as Harry, the most generic employee, as he is tasked with delivering reports to other departments. Soon he realizes something odd is going on around him.

Paperwork is a fun, colorful and cheerful platformer, with very easy mechanics, but very difficult obstacles along the way. Travel through 10 levels in 5 different departments, where you will have to jump, dodge and crouch with great timing, in order to deliver those reports. Each department has its own visual and gameplay style, accompanied with a varied, lively soundtrack. Between each level, you will have the chance to talk to your coworkers, who might give you clues about the mystery surrounding the company.

---Controls---

Gameplay

  • Move: A and D/Left and Right Arrow
  • Jump: Space/Right Shift
  • Crouch: S/Down Arrow
  • Climb:
    • Start: W/Up Arrow
    • Climb Up/Down: W and S/Up and Down Arrow
    • Jump off: Space/Right Shift
  • Pause: Escape/Backspace
  • Interact: E/Ctrl

Menu

  • Accept: Space/Right Shift/Enter
  • Back: Escape/Delete/Backspace
  • Select: W and S/Up and Down Arrow
  • Previous/Next: A and D/Left and Right Arrow

Dialog

  • Accept: Space/Right Shift/Enter
  • Speed up: Hold Space/Right Shift/Enter

Originally released for PlayStation Mobile on October 28th, 2014.
